pwiz::msdata::CVParamIs

pwiz::msdata::CVParamIs Struct Reference

#include <CVParam.hpp>

List of all members.

Detailed Description

functor for finding CVParam with specified exact CVID in a collection of CVParams:

vector<CVParam>::const_iterator it = find_if(params.begin(), params.end(), CVParamIs(MS_software));
